title: Is it a sin if we do not pray the 5 daily prayers? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: louis says what about if you don't pray the five normal times is it a sin it is indeed a major sin and if a person does not pray at all he's not a muslim anymore so if a person prays on and off he's committing a major sin and he's in great danger because this is a sign of hypocrisy but if he does not pray at all then he is not a muslim anymore
